engChrName: Nmm...
engSearchText: Nmm...

engChrName: Hey. Finally awake, huh?
engSearchText: Hey. Finally awake, huh?
jpnChrName: おお、起きたか。
jpnSearchText: おお、起きたか。

engChrName: Mmm... Morning, Van...
engSearchText: Mmm... Morning, Van...
jpnChrName: あ……ヴァンさん………
jpnSearchText: あ……ヴァンさん………

engChrName: Last night, did you...uh...
engSearchText: Last night, did you...uh...
jpnChrName: えっと……昨日、なにか──
jpnSearchText: えっと……昨日、なにか──

engChrName: Oh, we're in...the Shirin Desert? I read about it in one of my textbooks.
engSearchText:
Oh, we're in...the Shirin Desert? I read about it in
one of my textbooks.
jpnChrName: シーリーン砂漠…… ……教科書で読んだ……
jpnSearchText:
シーリーン砂漠……
……教科書で読んだ……

engChrName: Mugh...
engSearchText: Mugh...
jpnChrName: んん……
jpnSearchText: んん……

engChrName: You know, I kind of dig it.
engSearchText: You know, I kind of dig it.
jpnChrName: ……へっ、悪くねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ……へっ、悪くねぇな。

engChrName: We just entered the desert proper. We'll get to Tharbad in about an hour.
engSearchText:
We just entered the desert proper. We'll get to
Tharbad in about an hour.
jpnChrName: ちょうど砂漠に入ったとこだ。 目的地まではあと一時間ほどだな。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど砂漠に入ったとこだ。
目的地まではあと一時間ほどだな。

engChrName: In the meantime, I'm bushed. You take over, number three.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, I'm bushed. You take over,
number three.
jpnChrName: さすがに眠ィ……代われやバイト３号。
jpnSearchText: さすがに眠ィ……代われやバイト３号。

engChrName: Sweet Aidios, how the hell can he just pass out right there like it's nothing? It's like he's still in puberty or something.
engSearchText:
Sweet Aidios, how the hell can he just pass out right
there like it's nothing? It's like he's still in puberty
or something.
jpnChrName: ……寝つき良すぎだろ。 育ち盛りのガキじゃあるまいし。
jpnSearchText:
……寝つき良すぎだろ。
育ち盛りのガキじゃあるまいし。

engChrName: Haha! Hey, rest is important. Conking out on demand is, uh, a good skill to have!
engSearchText:
Haha! Hey, rest is important. Conking out on
demand is, uh, a good skill to have!
jpnChrName: えへへ、休息は大事ですし やっぱり一種の才能かと。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、休息は大事ですし
やっぱり一種の才能かと。

engChrName: He really did drive a lot. No wonder he's so tired.
engSearchText: He really did drive a lot. No wonder he's so tired.
jpnChrName: 運転お疲れ様でした、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: 運転お疲れ様でした、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: There sure are a lot of cars on the road.
engSearchText: There sure are a lot of cars on the road.
jpnChrName: 車が多いですね。
jpnSearchText: 車が多いですね。

engChrName: They must be traveling to the film festival.
engSearchText: They must be traveling to the film festival.
jpnChrName: ええ、みんな映画祭に 向かっているんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、みんな映画祭に
向かっているんでしょう。

engChrName: Now that the old man's sawing logs, nothing's stopping me from putting the pedal to the metal and seeing how fast this sucker can go.
engSearchText:
Now that the old man's sawing logs, nothing's
stopping me from putting the pedal to the metal and
seeing how fast this sucker can go.
jpnChrName: ハン……そいつも寝てるし 折角だから最高速を試してみるかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……そいつも寝てるし
折角だから最高速を試してみるかよ？

engChrName: How about no. Let's just get to Tharbad in one piece, please.
engSearchText:
How about no. Let's just get to Tharbad in one
piece, please.
jpnChrName: もう…… 安全運転でお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
もう……
安全運転でお願いします。

engChrName: Let's see, according to this map... Yep, like Van said, we're about an hour away.
engSearchText:
Let's see, according to this map... Yep, like Van said,
we're about an hour away.
jpnChrName: 地図によると…… あと１時間くらいですね。
jpnSearchText:
地図によると……
あと１時間くらいですね。

engChrName: Hey, there it is!
engSearchText: Hey, there it is!
jpnChrName: あ、見えてきましたっ。
jpnSearchText: あ、見えてきましたっ。

engChrName: That's the city, huh? Bigger than I imagined.
engSearchText: That's the city, huh? Bigger than I imagined.
jpnChrName: へえ、思ってたよりも デカそうじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、思ってたよりも
デカそうじゃねぇか。

engChrName: A city overlooking an oasis, perched right between tradition and modernity...
engSearchText:
A city overlooking an oasis, perched right between
tradition and modernity...
jpnChrName: はい、オアシス湖を臨む 伝統と革新の遊興都市──
jpnSearchText:
はい、オアシス湖を臨む
伝統と革新の遊興都市──

engChrName: That must be Tharbad, all right.
engSearchText: That must be Tharbad, all right.
jpnChrName: あれが、サルバッドですか。
jpnSearchText: あれが、サルバッドですか。

engChrName: Wahoo!
engSearchText: Wahoo!
jpnChrName: イ──ヤッハァ──！
jpnSearchText: イ──ヤッハァ──！

engChrName: Hell yeah! Let's kick this baby into overdrive! Give it all she's got!
engSearchText:
Hell yeah! Let's kick this baby into overdrive! Give it
all she's got!
jpnChrName: オラオラ、ガンガン飛ばせや！
jpnSearchText: オラオラ、ガンガン飛ばせや！

engChrName: Hey, let us go!
engSearchText: Hey, let us go!
jpnChrName: ねえ、降ろしてよー！
jpnSearchText: ねえ、降ろしてよー！

engChrName: If... If you don't take us back right now, I'm gonna sue you thugs when this is over!
engSearchText:
If... If you don't take us back right now, I'm gonna
sue you thugs when this is over!
jpnChrName: は、早く街に引き返さないと 訴えますよっ！
jpnSearchText:
は、早く街に引き返さないと
訴えますよっ！

engChrName: Ha! Relax. Nothing's gonna happen to you two. Nobody wants a couple of washboard little girls!
engSearchText:
Ha! Relax. Nothing's gonna happen to you two.
Nobody wants a couple of washboard little girls!
jpnChrName: はは、心配しなくても ガキや幼児体型には興味ないからさ！
jpnSearchText:
はは、心配しなくても
ガキや幼児体型には興味ないからさ！

engChrName: Hey! Who are you calling a little girl, huh?!
engSearchText: Hey! Who are you calling a little girl, huh?!
jpnChrName: むっ、誰がガキだコラーっ！
jpnSearchText: むっ、誰がガキだコラーっ！

engChrName: Oh, THAT does it! I'm suing you for sexual harassment while I'm at it!
engSearchText:
Oh, THAT does it! I'm suing you for sexual
harassment while I'm at it!
jpnChrName: セ、セクハラでも訴えますっ！
jpnSearchText: セ、セクハラでも訴えますっ！

engChrName: Shut the hell up back there!
engSearchText: Shut the hell up back there!
jpnChrName: 静かにしてろっつんだ、アア！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>静かにしてろっつんだ、アア！？

engHtmlText: 記者マリエル＆シャヒーナ
jpnSearchText: っ……！／ひっ……

engChrName: Seriously, you're gonna be fine. You two are simply bait for who we're really after.
engSearchText:
Seriously, you're gonna be fine. You two are simply
bait for who we're really after.
jpnChrName: クク……安心しろ、 お前らはタダのエサだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……安心しろ、
お前らはタダのエサだからよ。

engChrName: We've got our eyes on that actress and that fine-looking sister of yours. They won't be able to stop themselves from coming.
engSearchText:
We've got our eyes on that actress and that
fine-looking sister of yours. They won't be able to
stop themselves from coming.
jpnChrName: あの美味しそうな姉貴に女優なんかを おびき寄せるためのなァ。
jpnSearchText:
あの美味しそうな姉貴に女優なんかを
おびき寄せるためのなァ。

engChrName: But hey, who's to say we won't put you girls through the wringer for the hell of it, anyway? Haha.
engSearchText:
But hey, who's to say we won't put you girls through
the wringer for the hell of it, anyway? Haha.
jpnChrName: でもちょっとくらい痛い目に 遭ってもらうのもアリかもねぇ～？
jpnSearchText:
でもちょっとくらい痛い目に
遭ってもらうのもアリかもねぇ～？

engChrName: Mmgh...
engSearchText: Mmgh...
jpnSearchText: ……ううっ………

engChrName: You people are despicable.
engSearchText: You people are despicable.
jpnChrName: あ、貴方たちは……
jpnSearchText: あ、貴方たちは……

engChrName: Man, screw it, I can't stop thinking about it! I say we go hog wild! No holding back!
engSearchText:
Man, screw it, I can't stop thinking about it! I say we
go hog wild! No holding back!
jpnChrName: ヒヒ、考えるだけで堪んねぇなぁ！ 何もかもメチャクチャにしてやろうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ヒヒ、考えるだけで堪んねぇなぁ！
何もかもメチャクチャにしてやろうぜ！

engChrName: Exactly! The film festival's almost here. Gotta hype ourselves up somehow! Might as well have some fun!
engSearchText:
Exactly! The film festival's almost here. Gotta hype
ourselves up somehow! Might as well have some fun!
jpnChrName: 映画祭前の景気付けだ、 お互い愉しんでいこうじゃないかぁ！
jpnSearchText:
映画祭前の景気付けだ、
お互い愉しんでいこうじゃないかぁ！
っ……

engChrName: Wh-Where are you goons taking us anyway, huh?
engSearchText: Wh-Where are you goons taking us anyway, huh?
jpnChrName: そ、そもそもこの車、 どこに向かってるんですか……！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そもそもこの車、
どこに向かってるんですか……！？

engChrName: Huh? What do you mean where're we taking you? We're...
engSearchText:
Huh? What do you mean where're we taking you?
We're...
jpnChrName: ……アア……？　どこにってそりゃ……
jpnSearchText: ……アア……？　どこにってそりゃ……

engChrName: Hold on... Where ARE we supposed to be heading?
engSearchText: Hold on... Where ARE we supposed to be heading?
jpnChrName: ……あれ……どこだったっけぇ……？
jpnSearchText: ……あれ……どこだったっけぇ……？

engChrName: No! Shaheena! And Marielle, too!
engSearchText: No! Shaheena! And Marielle, too!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさん！ マリエルさんまで……
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナさん！
マリエルさんまで……

engChrName: What you're looking at are security camera stills.
engSearchText: What you're looking at are security camera stills.
jpnChrName: 監視カメラの画像だ。
jpnSearchText: 監視カメラの画像だ。

engChrName: From the looks of it, they nabbed the sister on her way home after she got tossed out of Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
From the looks of it, they nabbed the sister on her
way home after she got tossed out of Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: 妹の方はベガス社からつまみ出された後、 帰る途中で狙われたようだな。
jpnSearchText:
妹の方はベガス社からつまみ出された後、
帰る途中で狙われたようだな。

engChrName: And then Marielle was taken with her when she tried to intervene...
engSearchText:
And then Marielle was taken with her when she tried
to intervene...
jpnChrName: そして注意しようとした マリエルさんまでついでに……
jpnSearchText:
そして注意しようとした
マリエルさんまでついでに……

engChrName: Damn. These guys aren't screwing around.
engSearchText: Damn. These guys aren't screwing around.
jpnChrName: オイオイ、完全に犯罪じゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText: オイオイ、完全に犯罪じゃねぇか。

engChrName: It's a very unusual situation.
engSearchText: It's a very unusual situation.
jpnChrName: あまりに異常、ですね。
jpnSearchText: あまりに異常、ですね。

engChrName: It resembles the incident in Messeldam that the Marduk Company uncovered, during its follow-up investigation.
engSearchText:
It resembles the incident in Messeldam that the
Marduk Company uncovered, during its
follow-up investigation.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社の追跡調査で判明した メッセルダムの状況と似ています。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社の追跡調査で判明した
メッセルダムの状況と似ています。

engChrName: Say what?
engSearchText: Say what?

engChrName: ...No kidding?
engSearchText: ...No kidding?
jpnChrName: ……そうなのか？
jpnSearchText: ……そうなのか？

engChrName: Yep. As it just so happens, folks there saw a lot of strange fighting crop up out of nowhere, too.
engSearchText:
Yep. As it just so happens, folks there saw a lot of
strange fighting crop up out of nowhere, too.
jpnChrName: ああ──あちらでも似たような “異様な争い”が頻発していたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──あちらでも似たような
“異様な争い”が頻発していたらしい。

engChrName: While their hands were full trying to put it to rights, a series of mysterious fires broke out. After all that, they canceled the film festival.
engSearchText:
While their hands were full trying to put it to rights, a
series of mysterious fires broke out. After all that,
they canceled the film festival.
jpnChrName: そして各方面が対応に追われる中で 謎の小火が頻発し、映画祭は中止になった。
jpnSearchText:
そして各方面が対応に追われる中で
謎の小火が頻発し、映画祭は中止になった。

engChrName: That definitely sounds too similar to be a coincidence to me.
engSearchText:
That definitely sounds too similar to be a coincidence
to me.
jpnChrName: ハン、あまりにもネタが 符合しすぎているってわけかよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、あまりにもネタが
符合しすぎているってわけかよ。

engChrName: Don't forget, Messeldam used to be where A's headquarters were located, too.
engSearchText:
Don't forget, Messeldam used to be where A's
headquarters were located, too.
jpnChrName: そして消えてしまったとはいえ、 メッセルダムは《Ａ》の元本拠地──
jpnSearchText:
そして消えてしまったとはいえ、
メッセルダムは《Ａ》の元本拠地──

engChrName: And remember the shell company they used to rent out the warehouse in Langport? That was the Tharbad Transportation Company.
engSearchText:
And remember the shell company they used to rent
out the warehouse in Langport? That was the
Tharbad Transportation Company.
jpnChrName: 煌都であの人たちが倉庫を借りてたのは 《サルバッド通運》という架空会社でした。
jpnSearchText:
煌都であの人たちが倉庫を借りてたのは
《サルバッド通運》という架空会社でした。

engChrName: Shit. I didn't put that together!
engSearchText: Shit. I didn't put that together!
jpnChrName: ……！ そいつがあったか！
jpnSearchText:
……！
そいつがあったか！

engChrName: That must mean it's all connected!
engSearchText: That must mean it's all connected!
jpnChrName: 繋がってきたみたいです……！
jpnSearchText: 繋がってきたみたいです……！

engChrName: ...We still haven't seen any signs of organized crime in Tharbad. Or any other gang activity for that matter.
engSearchText:
...We still haven't seen any signs of organized crime
in Tharbad. Or any other gang activity for
that matter.
jpnChrName: ──今のところサルバッドに マフィアや半グレの兆候は掴めてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
──今のところサルバッドに
マフィアや半グレの兆候は掴めてねぇ。

engChrName: But let's assume for a minute these guys have a hand in all these incidents of people coming unglued.
engSearchText:
But let's assume for a minute these guys have a hand
in all these incidents of people coming unglued.
jpnChrName: だがもし“タガが外れたような事件”に 連中が結びついているとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
だがもし“タガが外れたような事件”に
連中が結びついているとしたら……

engChrName: It's possible that stuff their members like to use could also be involved.
engSearchText:
It's possible that stuff their members like to use could
also be involved.
jpnChrName: 構成員自体も使ってやがった “ブツ”が関係してるかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
構成員自体も使ってやがった
“ブツ”が関係してるかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: You don't mean...!
engSearchText: You don't mean...!

engChrName: Wait, like—
engSearchText: Wait, like—
jpnChrName: そ、それって……
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……

engChrName: You mean what Heiyue's got a hard ban on? Yeah, I could definitely see it.
engSearchText:
You mean what Heiyue's got a hard ban on? Yeah, I
could definitely see it.
jpnChrName: 《黒月》がご禁制にしてるアレか。 ハッ、いかにもありそうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
《黒月》がご禁制にしてるアレか。
ハッ、いかにもありそうじゃねえか。

engChrName: Even if that's true, how they're getting it to people out here is the big question.
engSearchText:
Even if that's true, how they're getting it to people
out here is the big question.
jpnChrName: ……だがその場合、どうやって 広めているかという話になりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……だがその場合、どうやって
広めているかという話になりそうだ。

engChrName: Indeed. From what I have heard, that is exactly what the police and guild are both attempting to hone in on.
engSearchText:
Indeed. From what I have heard, that is exactly what
the police and guild are both attempting to hone
in on.
jpnChrName: ええ、警察やギルドもそちらには 目を光らせていると聞いていますし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、警察やギルドもそちらには
目を光らせていると聞いていますし。

engChrName: ...Feels like the pieces for this mystery are startin' to come together.
engSearchText:
...Feels like the pieces for this mystery are startin' to
come together.
jpnChrName: ……いくつかピースは揃ってきた。
jpnSearchText: ……いくつかピースは揃ってきた。

engChrName: If A's actually involved in all of this, they definitely seem to be keeping a low profile, at least for now.
engSearchText:
If A's actually involved in all of this, they definitely
seem to be keeping a low profile, at least for now.
jpnChrName: “奴ら”が関わっているとしても 今回はまだ身を潜めていそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
“奴ら”が関わっているとしても
今回はまだ身を潜めていそうだが……

engChrName: Hopefully, once we get a hold of these dumbasses and get 'em to talk, things'll start to look a bit clearer.
engSearchText:
Hopefully, once we get a hold of these dumbasses and
get 'em to talk, things'll start to look a bit clearer.
jpnChrName: その辺りは馬鹿どもを締め上げれば 少しは見えてくんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
その辺りは馬鹿どもを締め上げれば
少しは見えてくんだろ。
